nodes.text: Assault on Hoth was a two-person board game produced by West End Games in 1988. The game included 55 stand-up playing pieces, 2 decks of move cards, 8 picture dice, and a rulebook.
Can you, as General Veers, commander of the Imperial Ground Assault group, destroy the Rebel energy shield generator and crush the Rebellion before the Rebels can evacuate the planet?
Can you, as General Rieekan, commander of the Rebel Ground Defense force, delay the massive Imperial Walkers long enough for your band of freedom fighters to make their escape?
